ModMetaData.name: Ferrex Race (Continued)
ModMetaData.author: Xen
ModMetaData.description:
Update of Xens mod https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2018387954
[img]https://i.imgur.com/wtwHAQu.png[/img]
Support-chat: https://invite.gg/mlie
Non-steam version: https://github.com/emipa606/FerrexRace
--- Original Description --- The Ferrex are a ferret(Mustelid) humanoid species. This race is attributed with a great degree of business acumen! Uses the Alien Framework V2.0 by Erdelf and co.
Art by Xen. Inspired largely by Ekksu's great ferret art for the Animal collab project!
